info.title: Custom API
info.description: This is the place to add your own path endpoints

get.summary: Retrieve a formatted table of contents for the document
get.description: Retrieve a formatted table of contents for the document, transformed via ODD

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The view type used by the main view which displays the document, e.g. 'page' or 'div'. This has an influence on the generated links, which need to differ when linking to a page rather than a section.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target channel into which link selection events should be send (if the user clicks on a link)

parameters.name: icons
parameters.description: Should an expand/collapse icon be displayed next to headings having nested child sections?

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version to base the TOC on. Should be 'Original-German' for synoptic

200.description: Returns the formatted table of contents as HTML
